thread.section_title: Vacatia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacatia | www.vacatia.com
thread.title: Hank

author: Hank
title: Hank
text:
Living in the Silicon Valley and looking to get away from the city for a get away with the friends and family. Looking at hotels and packages has always been my weak point and using other sites like Expedia, Kayak was just too complicated and way too much stress on me.
As I look around the web, I found this great new website called Vacatia and fell in love with it right when I entered the site. I was so surprised with the selections and descriptions they have provided, I fell in love with Vacatia right away. Without hesitation I want to book my rental but right away, I found out they have a live chat function with a Vacatia agent.
I was taken care of by Guest Care Agent Dan and I booked my trip to Tahoe at the Marriott Timber Lounge. I would recommend Vacatia to anyone and please ask for Dan for his service. He optimistic attitude and his professionalism is what is missing from the current Vacation Rental Industry. TWO THUMBS WAY UP!
